articles.title: India vs Australia Weather And Pitch Report: Rain Threat Looms Large On T20 World Cup Super 8 Clash - NDTV Sports
articles.description: A defeat here will almost end Australia’s T20 World Cup journey while a win would keep their hopes alive.
articles.content: Super Eight - Match 11 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, 2024 will be played between Australia and India (AUS vs IND) at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, Gros Islet, St Lucia on Monday. In the… [+3698 chars]
